text.tspan: A completely new area will be added
through post-launch DLC, in which you
The game will be ported to the Nintendo Switch,
We will add a system that allows you to make use of
the engine's flexibility to create new NPCs, change
physics, add new platforming elements, and more!
An in-game editor will be added
through a post-launch update, to allow you to
create levels and share them with the community
A side questline will be added surrounding
a strange figure calling themselves "the synthesis"
